qas.question: When was the system originally supposed to be released?
Retailers in what test area reported a miserable failure of sales?
When was the second time Nintendo test marketed the NES?
When was the nationwide release of the NES?
When was the system originally not supposed to be released?
Retailers in what test area reported a success of sales?
When was the first time Nintendo test marketed the NES?
When was the non-nationwide release of the NES?

context: The system was originally targeted for release in the <a0_0><b4_0>spring of 1985<b4_0/><a0_0/>, but the release date was pushed back. After test-marketing in the <a1_0><b5_0>New York City<b5_0/><a1_0/> area in late fall, retailers had reportedly stated the system "failed miserably".[contradictory] While others stated that Nintendo had an excellent nine-week market test in New York last fall Due to the moderate success launch in New York City, Nintendo tried a second time; the system was test-marketed further beginning in <a2_0><b6_0>February 1986<b6_0/><a2_0/>, with the nationwide release occurring in <a3_0><b7_0>September 1986<b7_0/><a3_0/>.
